title: JU Scholars conferred ‘Best Research Paper Award’
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Dec 20: At an international conference held on ‘Artificial Intelligence for Innovation, Insight, Integration and Impact for Sustainable Business’ at Chandigarh University in collaboration with Capilano University, Canada, Scholars from the Department of Law at University of Jammu (JU) were awarded Best Research Paper Award. A handout stated that Parul Sharma and Sheetal Priya, PhD Scholars were conferred the award. Under the guidance of Prof. Sanjay Gupta and Dr. Raj Kumar, the Scholars presented a research paper […]
